Singgung Gedung SD Ambruk, Jokowi: November Masih Tender Konstruksi Rp 31 T?
06 Nov 2019, 11:10 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) nampak kaget saat tahu masih ada tender yang berproses di November 2019. Untuk tender di bidang konstruksi, nilainya mencapai Rp 31,7 triliun.
"Tadi saya lihat Pak Roni ( Kepala LKPP Roni Dwi Susanto) menyampaikan November masih ada e-tendering. Mari kita ulang-ulang seperti itu, apakah mau kita ulang-ulang kayak gitu? Ini tinggal November, Desember masih e-tendering," kata Jokowi saat membuka Rakornas LKPP di JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Jokowi menyebut urusan kontruksi tidak bisa dikerjakan terburu-buru. "Meski tahu ada yang cepat, tapi apakah seperti ini mau kita teruskan? Rp 31 triliun, e-tendering bener bisa cepat. Tapi ini urusan konstruksi. Mau manggil siapa kontraktornya? siapa coba maju sini saya beri sepeda," imbuh Jokowi.
Jokowi meminta kejadian ini tidak lagi diulangi. Sebab menurutnya, jika pengerjaan konstruksi main asal kebut, maka dapat berpengaruh buruk pada kualitas infrastruktur yang dibangun.
"Lepas Agustus masih urusan lelang, gimana? Tapi kenyataannya masih banyak dan ini kita ulang terus kesalahan sepeerti ini. Akhirnya apa? Ya kualitasnya jelek. Jembatan ambruk, ya kayak gini November masih lelang, SD ambruk. karena kerja cepat-cepatan dan pas kerja pas basah, hujan," ujar Jokowi dengan nada meninggi.
"Nggak mungkin pekerjanya masih payung. Sudah bohong kayak gitu. Kesimpulan jelas jangan seperti ini," tegas eks Gubernur DKI Jakarta ini.
Jokowi berjanji akan menaruh perhatian khusus pada kementerian/lembaga hingga Pemda/Pemprov yang masih melakukan tender konstruksi di akhir tahun. Dia menyebut pola pikir yang manual menghambat proses tender.
"Tahun depan saya lihat kalau masih ada di kabupaten, daerah, provinsi, kementerian mana. Ini proses e-proc masih jalan tapi bertahun-tahun, mindset kita masih manual. Buat apa bangun sistem seperti itu kalau bulan November masih ada e-tendering," ujar Jokowi.

(dkp/aud)

Amenduk Ambruk Elementary School Building, Jokowi: November Still Tender for Rp. 31 Trillion Construction?
Nov 6, 2019, 11:10 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) looked surprised when he found out that there were still tenders that were proceeding in November 2019. For the tender in the construction sector, the value reached Rp 31.7 trillion.
"Earlier, I saw Mr. Roni (Head of LKPP Roni Dwi Susanto) conveying that November there was still e-tendering. Let's do it like that again, do we want to repeat it like that? This is only November, December is still e-tendering," said Jokowi when opening the National Coordination Meeting of LKPP at JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Jokowi said construction matters could not be done in a hurry. "Even though we know something is fast, but do we want to continue like this? Rp 31 trillion, e-tendering can be really fast. But this is construction. Want to call the contractor? Whoever tries to advance here I will give a bicycle," Jokowi added.
Jokowi asked that this incident not be repeated. Because according to him, if the construction of the main racing car, then it can adversely affect the quality of the infrastructure built.
"After August, it is still a matter of auction, how about it? But the reality is there are still many and we keep repeating this kind of error. Finally what? Yes, the quality is bad. when it's wet, it's raining, "Jokowi said in a rising tone.
"There's no way the workers are still umbrellas. It's a lie like that. Conclusions clearly don't be like this," said the former Governor of DKI Jakarta.
Jokowi promised to pay special attention to the ministries / institutions up to the Regional Government / Provincial Government who is still conducting a construction tender at the end of the year. He called the mindset that manuals hamper the tender process.
"Next year I will see if there are still districts, regions, provinces, ministries. This e-proc process is still running but for years, our mindset is still manual. Why build such a system if in November there is still e-tendering, "Jokowi said.

(dkp / aud)
